### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE waste_types (
  waste_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_name VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_info (
  waste_info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  collection_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (waste_type_id) REFERENCES waste_types(waste_type_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE waste_types SET waste_type_name = 'Plastic Bottles' WHERE waste_type_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE waste_types (
  waste_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_name VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_info (
  waste_info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  collection_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (waste_type_id) REFERENCES waste_types(waste_type_id),

);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE waste_info SET location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'Recycling Center') WHERE waste_type_id = 3;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE WasteTypes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Quantities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  quantity_unit VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  waste_type_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE WasteTypes SET description='Biodegradable waste' WHERE id=1;
